body:
Eduardo,

Good question.  The EnergyPlus Reference section on the natural ventilation objects that the component is using is a good place to start and will go through the formulas that are calculating the air flow:

[http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-0/input-output-reference/pa...](http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-0/input-output-reference/page-018.html#zoneventilationwindandstackopenarea)

This said, while the reference explains the formulas, you might want something a little more in-depth to understand all of the physics.  I know that this book covers both the formulas and the physics:

[https://books.google.com/books/about/Ventilation_of_Buildings.html?...](https://books.google.com/books/about/Ventilation_of_Buildings.html?id=Nq5XYFQRFD4C&hl=en)

Feel free to post any specific questions about the formulas here if things are unclear form these two resources.

-Chris
